about_the_game: Whether you want to get pumped up for a battle, celebrate a recent victory or soothe your nerves after a nerve-wracking defeat, you will find the right music to complement your mood among the 21 tracks (over 48 minutes in total) by Volodymyr Savin that form the Official Soundtrack of Men of War II!
detailed_description: Whether you want to get pumped up for a battle, celebrate a recent victory or soothe your nerves after a nerve-wracking defeat, you will find the right music to complement your mood among the 21 tracks (over 48 minutes in total) by Volodymyr Savin that form the Official Soundtrack of Men of War II!

short_description: The Official Soundtrack of Men of War II by Volodymyr Savin – 21 tracks and over 48 minutes of atmospheric music for any Commander to listen to even outside of a battle!
